description:
Maybe “off the grid” isn’t such a big deal. The Yeti 3000X gives you portable power – anywhere. Lightweight lithium batteries offer on-grid convenience without any of the fumes or noise of a generator. Wi-Fi integration lets you use the free Yeti app to check charge and discharge rates, turn ports on or off, monitor temperatures, update firmware and much more, from anywhere you have a signal. Or, if your phone isn't within reach, find the same information in the onboard digital display. With a full suite of charging ports, you can charge or run almost anything, from power tools out in the field, to an actual fridge in your camp kitchen.

  • Upgraded 2000W AC (3500W surge) inverter can power even the most power-hungry household devices
  • Wi-Fi lets you control the Yeti 3000X remotely, so you can check charging and discharging status, update firmware, turn ports on or off, and much more
  • LCD power status display for power use, battery charge capacity and time remaining under current load
  • Charges via included wall charger, going from 0 to full in 14 hours, or 6-72 hours from a compatible solar panel (bigger and more efficient panels take less time)
  • MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracker) technology enables more efficient charging via solar panels in low-light conditions
  • Li-NMC (lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide) battery offers a longer life than standard lithium-ion batteries and better inherent safety, and they're lighter than lead-acid batteries
  • Battery can be kept plugged into a power source during storage, or fully charge your Yeti 3000X Lithium every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
  • Included Yeti cart makes moving your power from A-to-B a whole lot easier
  • Peak capacity is 3032 Wh (10.8V, 280.8Ah) and lasts through hundreds of cycles
  • Smart management system provides charging (solar or mains) and low-battery protection built-in
  • 4 USB ports (output): 2 x type-A at 5V, up to 2.4A (12W max), 2 x USB-C 1 at 5V, up to 3.0A (18W max), and 1 at USB-PD spec 5–20V up to 3.0A (60W max), all ports are regulated
  • 6mm port (output): 12V, up to 13A (120W max)
  • 12V car port (output): 12V, up to 13A (120W max)
  • 12V power pole port (output): 12V, up to 30A (360W max)
  • AC inverter (output, 60Hz, pure sine wave): 120VAC 16.5A (2000W, 3500W surge)
  • Provides pass-through power, so you can plug your Yeti into the wall and then your device into your Yeti to make sure your device stays powered should the power go out
  • Charging port (input, 8mm):14-50V, up to 10A (150W max)
  • Power-pole charging port (input): 14-50V, up to 50A 600W max)
  • Expansion port in the storage compartment, for use ONLY with Goal Zero modules
  • Storage compartment keeps cables and adapters close and where you need them
  • Operating temp is 0-40°C
  • Includes a Goal Zero Yeti 3000X Lithium Power Station, Yeti Cart and a wall charger
  • Do not attempt to charge your yeti lithium from a 12v source with anything but the yeti 12v car charging cable (sold separately). Doing so may cause damage to the unit
name: Goal Zero Yeti 3000X Portable Power Station
